Numbers__21.3__Anathema: : That is, a thing devoted to utter destruction.
Numbers__21.5__Very light food: : So they call the heavenly manna: thus worldlings loathe the things of heaven, for which they have no relish.
Numbers__21.6__Fiery serpents: : They are so called, because they that were bitten by them were burnt with a violent heat.
Numbers__21.9__A brazen serpent: : This was a figure of Christ crucified, and of the efficacy of a lively faith in him, against the bites of the hellish serpent. John 3. 14.
Numbers__21.14__The book of the wars: : An ancient book, which, like several others quoted in scripture, has been lost.
